name: The Wineman (UK) LTD
tag_list: wine, buy-wine, internet-wine-retailer, wine-merchant, champagne, corporate-gifts
overview:
Wineman.co.uk is an online wine retailer who sell wine from many countries and specialise in wines that are sold in restaurants.

Founded in 2003 by Kevin O’Rourke the company was originally called Kevin O’Rourke Wines but traded online under the URL wineman.co.uk. It changed to a limited company Wineman (UK) LTD in 2012 to avoid any confusion.

There is no minimum order and delivery is to the UK only.

Kevin O’Rourke has spent his entire life in the restaurant trade and has taken his passion for serving great wine and food to supplying those wine to the public which are often only available to the On Trade.
